item.title: George MacKay’s Venice Double Feature: “These Films Were Made With Such Love”
item.description: The British star unpacks two of his Venice-bound films: Mark Jenkin’s time-travel feature ‘Rose of Nevada’ with fellow countryman Callum Turner and the Marianne Faithfull documentary ‘Broken English’:
